main.name: Rafael Quarles
main.description: Senior student developer in CS at KSU, graduating December 2020
main.bio: I am an athlete by heart and live to continuously improve myself whether it be strength or wisdom. I beleive anything can be acheived not through hard work alone, but consistent and disciplined work. Everyday I like to spend at least an hour outside, as one would find me either in the gym or out on the pitch playing soccer. I like to keep my lifestyle active although I do spend many hours on the computer.
main.contactmessage: Thanks for stopping by my site, hope to hear from you soon!

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics
education.description: Pursuing my Bachelors of Computer Science, I achieved a thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind complex programming. At KSU, I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, all the while developing a solid foundation in the many aspects of Computer Science.

testimonials.text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
